Class JshintrcTokenMaker

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenMaker

    public class JshintrcTokenMaker
extends JsonTokenMaker
    Scanner for .jshintrc files. This is equivalent to JSON with C-style end-of-line comments.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Futrell
